name: QP: Win a game after bringing 10 unique cards
Yuki: Win a game with Wins
Aru: Cause Other Players to draw 4+ Cards in one Turn
Suguri: Roll a movement of 12 or higher.
Hime: KO 2 players in a single turn
Sora: KO a Player from 6+ Spaces Away
Marc: KO a Full HP player with x16 Big Rocket
Fernet: Complete a Wins Norma of 4 or higher
Peat: Successfully Evade after using your Hyper
Marie Poppo: KO a player with "Reverse Attribute Field"
Tomomo: At any point, be the only standing player.
Chicken: Land on your own Hyper
Robo Ball: Obtain 5+ wins in a single game
Seagull: Play your Hyper and a Battle Card together
Store Manager: KO the field boss
Shifu Robot: KO the field boss
Flying Castle: KO the field boss
Syura: KO a player while at 1 HP
Nanako: Gain Atleast 3 ATK from your Hyper
Saki: KO a player who lands on your Hyper
Krilalaris: Increase your Max HP to 8
Kyoko: Survive a match without being KO'd by another player
Sham: Force a player to fight the boss
Sherry: KO another player or the field boss with Shield Counter
Star Breaker: Hold 200 or more Stars
Sweet Breaker: Use Melting Memories to flip 3 cards from a single player
Nath: Reach 3 stacks of Active Extension
Mimyuu: Have any player draw Evil Spy Work - Execution off of Passionate Research
Tomato: KO a player within one chapter of them KOing Mimyuu
Kiriko: Lower your Max HP to 2
NoName: KO a player in Head Form
Ceoreparque: Complete a Norma two consecutive chapters in a row
Miusaki: Win a battle where Final Battle is played
Yuki (Dangerous): Complete a Wins Norma of 4 or higher
Tequila: KO another player while you have 1 HP
Mio: 50 or more stars from Magical Inferno
